Class ErrorController

java.lang.Object
scot.gov.scotaccountclient.ErrorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.ErrorController
@Controller public class ErrorController extends Object implements org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.ErrorController
Custom error controller for displaying user-friendly error pages.

Handles application errors and formats them into readable error pages with appropriate details for troubleshooting OAuth2/OIDC authentication issues.

  • Method Details

    • handleError

      @RequestMapping("/error") public String handleError(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles all application errors and displays a user-friendly error page.

      Special handling for OAuth2 token exchange errors to provide detailed diagnostic information.

      Parameters:
      request - HTTP request
      model - Model for view rendering
      Returns:
      View name for error page

    • handleTokenExchangeError

      private String handleTokenExchangeError(Throwable throwable, Map<String,Object> errorAttrs, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles token exchange errors with detailed diagnostic information.
      Parameters:
      throwable - The exception that occurred
      errorAttrs - Error attributes from Spring
      model - Model for view rendering
      Returns:
      View name for error page
